Drive More Traffic & Sales To Your Shopify Stores

Drive More Traffic & Sales To Your Shopify Stores

Want more sales and traffic? Having trouble ranking for keywords? SEO seems confusing and/or want it completely outsourced? or do you want to grow your store to new heights? These are common pains a lot of Shopify owners seems to be having and there hasn't been a viable solution to these problems. 

"I was struggling to drive more traffic to my store. It was almost as if I was "stuck" and couldn't grow further" - Samantha, CA 

The problem is, stores forget the power of SEO and how to leverage Google, Yahoo, and Bing to drive sales to their stores. https://seomerce.com/shopify-seo-experts/Everyone is focused on "Facebook ads" and growing their page, but forget about the thousands of potential customers browsing Google search engines. Majority of stores have zero optimization, killing their organic growth and losing out on thousands of dollars sitting on the table.

Your average store owner doesn't care about SEO or AdWords and often ignored. However, once they do learn about its potential, they fail to optimize correctly and eventually give up. They failed to realize their competitors are milking the advantages Google has to offer. 

"I knew nothing about SEO and was trying very hard to rank my site, but nothing seemed to happen. I was miserable because I knew I was losing money " - Rick, WV

Welcome SEOMERCE, an Ecommerce-Driven SEO agency https://seomerce.com/shopify-seo-experts/#pricingthat has helped 100's of Shopify store owners grow their organic traffic due to strategies tailored just for Shopify stores. With our expertise, you will get strategies unknown to your competitors that will help you rank for keywords that will attract more search buyers to your products and services. https://seomerce.com/shopify-seo-experts/

"Thanks to SEOMERCE, I was able to grow my fashion business that was stagnating in growth to nearly 100% increase in new revenue on the monthly basis. They really helped me grow!" Amber, NYC
